quick_answer.text: A typical 8 oz grilled ribeye steak has 661 calories and 55 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a ribeye steak?
faqs.a: About 661 calories for a typical 8 oz grilled ribeye steak.

faqs.q: How much protein is in a ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Around 55 g protein per 8 oz serving.

faqs.q: Is ribeye steak high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, it has about 48 g total fat, including 20 g saturated fat, due to marbling.

faqs.q: What's the cholesterol in a ribeye steak?
Does cooking method affect calories in ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Yes—grilling keeps it lower; frying or adding butter can add 40–100+ calories.
